casebody.data:
G.W. HOUSTON, Petitioner
v.
TOWN OF CHAPEL HILL, A Municipality, Respondent and
The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, Third-Party Respondent. No. 354P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2006. Robert A. Hassell, G. Keith Whited, Graham, for Houston. Ralph D. Karpinos, Town Attorney, Chapel Hill, for Town of Chapel Hill. Thomas J. Ziko, Special Deputy Attorney General, Katherine A. Murphy, Assistant Attorney General, for UNC at Chapel Hill. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 630 S.E.2d 249 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th day of July 2006 by Petitioner (Houston) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of December 2006."
